org.apache.poi.hwpf.model

Interface CharIndexTranslator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OldTextPieceTable, TextPieceTable 

    @Internal
public interface CharIndexTranslator

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getByteIndex(int charPos)
      Calculates the byte index of the given char index.(计算给定char索引的字节索引。)
      int[][] getCharIndexRanges(int startBytePosInclusive, int endBytePosExclusive)
      Finds character ranges that includes specified byte range.(查找包括指定字节范围的字符范围。)
      boolean isIndexInTable(int bytePos)
      Check if index is in table(检查索引是否在表中)
      int lookIndexBackward(int bytePos)
      Return last index <= bytePos that is in table(返回表中的最后一个索引<= bytePos)
      int lookIndexForward(int bytePos)
      Return first index >= bytePos that is in table(返回表中的第一个索引>= bytePos)

    • Method Detail

      • getByteIndex

        int getByteIndex(int charPos)
        Calculates the byte index of the given char index.(计算给定char索引的字节索引。)
        Parameters:
        charPos - The char position(charPos -字符位置)
        Returns:
        The byte index(的字节索引)

      • getCharIndexRanges

        int[][] getCharIndexRanges(int startBytePosInclusive,
                           int endBytePosExclusive)
        Finds character ranges that includes specified byte range.(查找包括指定字节范围的字符范围。)
        Parameters:
        startBytePosInclusive - start byte range(startBytePosInclusive -开始字节范围)
        endBytePosExclusive - end byte range(endBytePosExclusive -结束字节范围)

      • isIndexInTable

        boolean isIndexInTable(int bytePos)
        Check if index is in table(检查索引是否在表中)
        Parameters:
        bytePos -(字节Pos-)
        Returns:
        true if index in table, false if not(如果表中有索引，则为真，否则为假)

      • lookIndexForward

        int lookIndexForward(int bytePos)
        Return first index >= bytePos that is in table(返回表中的第一个索引>= bytePos)
        Parameters:
        bytePos -(字节Pos-)
        Returns:
        first index greater or equal to bytePos that is in table(第一个索引大于或等于表中的字节Pos)

      • lookIndexBackward

        int lookIndexBackward(int bytePos)
        Return last index <= bytePos that is in table(返回表中的最后一个索引<= bytePos)
        Parameters:
        bytePos -(字节Pos-)
        Returns:
        last index less of equal to bytePos that is in table(最后一个索引小于或等于表中的字节Pos)
